casebody.data:
RATHORE
v.
BERMAN MTG. CORP. No. 571P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. Edward L. Embree, III, Michael J. Byrne, Morrisville, for Berman Mtg.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of December 2007 by Plaintiff for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
